name: Annesdale House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights and the suite we were given was of a good size, very clean and had an excellent sitting room that looked towards the garden and a private entrance. There are lots of nice touches such as the fridge in the room as well as other gadgets such as a CD player. Breakfast was good (and certainly the best sausages on our two week trip) and Alena, in particular, was very attentive and keen to ensure everything was in order. On the down side the bathroom was a bit tight on size and as the shower was in the bath some guests might find it difficult to get in and out. Although on a busy road the fact it is so close to the shops and restaurants in town means it is only a short stroll to everything you need in the evening.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: My Grandmother and I spent a few nights in different parts of England, and when we came upon this place, we were blown away with the comfortable situation and hospitality of Annesdale House. While it did take some work to find, due to a lack of signage, the experience at this B&B has been nothing but pleasant. The owners of the place are eager to ensure that every need is met, the food prepared leaves nothing to be desired, and the location puts everything within a short walk's reach. The room we stayed in was spacious, cozy and lacked for nothing.
reviews.title: An Amazing Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we went to Windermer in search of a romantic place to stay for our Honeymoon and we were not disappointed. Alena and Roger with their friendly and welcoming approach made us feel at home in in this beautiful Bed and Breakfast All the amenities and best restaurants are nearby, the room was spotless, tastefully decorated, with a luxurious bed and the massive bathroom with the underfloor heating was a treat, the large garden is astonishing and after our walks in the lake we spent few sunny afternoons surrounded by magnificent flowers in full bloom. We had delicious breakfast cooked by the owners and lots of interesting conversations about Art and walking in the Lake district. We sincerely thank our hosts for making our stay so comfortable and enjoyable and highly recommend this place as one of the best we ever stayed in.
reviews.title: A Romantic Perfect Stay

reviews.text: Beautiful suite of rooms that were extremely tastefully decorated with quality furnishings. Alena and Roger were interesting, relaxed, genuinely welcoming and made a lovely breakfast. This is one of the best B & B's I have stayed at. Thank you.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: Stayed for a week in this beautiful Bed and Breakfast. Perfectly situated in Windermere for restaurants and shops. The rooms were beautifully and tastefully decorated. They were immaculately clean and the bedding and towels were of a very good quality.
reviews.title: Perfection

description: A haven of peace and tranquility in Windermere, 2 beautiful garden suites just moments from the centre of the village and railway station. A perfect base to explore the Lakes.
